item.title: 英国央行资本顾问称，如果规则改变，应放弃 AT1s
item.description: 英国央行一位专门负责监管资本的顾问在一次行业活动上表示，如果英国央行决定全面修订其规则，附加一级债券不应成为银行资本堆栈的一部分。【原文：Additional Tier 1 bonds should not be part of banks’ capital stack if and when the Bank of England decides to overhaul its rules, an adviser at the central bank specializing in regulatory capital said at an industry event.】

item.title: 彪马与阿迪达斯股价表现差距进一步拉大
item.description: 自从比约恩-古尔登（Bjorn Gulden）跳槽到阿迪达斯股份公司（Adidas AG）和彪马股份公司（Puma SE）之后，这两家德国体育用品制造商之间的股价表现差距变得更大了。【原文：The gulf in performance between Adidas AG and Puma SE shares since Bjorn Gulden hopped between the German sportswear makers just got even wider.】

item.title: Stellantis 供应商 CLN 要求银行减记 90% 债务
item.description: 意大利汽车零部件制造商 CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA 要求银行债权人减记约 90% 的无担保贷款，以求在汽车行业危机中大幅削减债务。【原文：Italian car-parts manufacturer CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA asked bank creditors to write down about 90% of their unsecured loans as it seeks to drastically reduce its debt amid the crisis in the automotive sector.】

item.title: 阿联酋部长对今年贸易额持续增长持乐观态度
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对进口商品征收高额关税，但阿拉伯联合酋长国认为今年的全球贸易仍将增长。【原文：The United Arab Emirates sees global trade growing this year, despite US President Donald Trump threatening to impose major tariffs on imports.】

item.title: PJT 与新世界债券持有人就贷款谈判举行电话会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，债务顾问公司PJT Partners Inc.周四与新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Ltd.）的一些美元债券持有人举行了一次电话会议，讨论这家陷入困境的开发商正在进行的贷款谈判最终是否会导致其债券违约的风险。【原文：Debt adviser PJT Partners Inc. held a call with some New World Development Ltd. dollar-bond holders Thursday to discuss whether the distressed developer’s ongoing loan talks could eventually risk a default on its bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦啤酒制造商的争议税款增至 7,300 万美元
item.description: 由于可口可乐公司在当地的装瓶商继续通过法律途径要求以当地货币支付税款，津巴布韦啤酒制造商德尔塔公司（Delta Corp.【原文：Zimbabwean beer maker Delta Corp.’s disputed tax bill has risen to $73 million as the local bottler of Coca-Cola Co. continues its legal bid to pay these levies in local currency.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦寻求引渡与伊姆兰-汗有关联的地产大亨
item.description: 巴基斯坦正在寻求从阿拉伯联合酋长国引渡房地产大亨马利克-里亚兹-侯赛因（Malik Riaz Hussain），此前法院宣布他在一起贪污案中潜逃，前总理伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）因滥用职权于上周被定罪。【原文：Pakistan is seeking extradition of a real estate tycoon Malik Riaz Hussain from the United Arab Emirates, after a court declared him an absconder in a graft case in which former prime minister Imran Khan was convicted last week for misusing his power.】

item.title: 挪威在本月利率未变的情况下三月降息
item.description: 挪威央行在本月将借贷成本维持在16年来的最高水平不变后，让投资者对其3月份的首次宽松举措做好了准备。【原文：Norway’s central bank primed investors for its first easing move in March after keeping borrowing costs unchanged this month at a 16-year high.】

item.title: 奇货可居：公司究竟如何在人工智能上花钱（播客）
item.description: 从理论上讲，所有这些人工智能支出都必须带来某种回报。公司（或其他最终用户）必须从人工智能的产出中获得切实的价值，这样才能证明在研究、芯片、能源等方面花费数十亿美元是合理的。那么，在企业层面究竟发生了什么？在本期节目中，我们采访了 Ramp 公司的联合创始人兼首席执行官埃里克-格莱曼（Eric Glyman）。因此，他可以在前排看到实际支出情况以及谁在支出。【原文：In theory, all of this AI spending has to deliver some kind of return. Companies (or other end users) will have to get tangible value from its outputs in order to justify the billions spent on research, chips, energy, and more. So what’s actually happening at the corporate level? On this episode, we speak with Eric Glyman, who is the co-founder and CEO of Ramp, which helps corporations manage their expenses. As such, he has front row visibility in terms of what’s actually being spent and who is】

item.title: 行业整合之际，沙特阿拉伯权衡全球矿业交易
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正在寻求矿业交易，以确保其工业化计划所需的重要矿产供应，而此时该行业正掀起一股试图整合的浪潮。【原文：Saudi Arabia is looking for mining deals in a push to secure supplies of critical minerals for its industrialization plan, just as a wave of attempted consolidation sweeps the sector.】

item.title: 印尼寻求推迟部分液化天然气出口以满足国内需求
item.description: 印度尼西亚是液化天然气的主要供应国，随着国内能源需求的增加，印尼要求其海外买家接受部分原定装运时间的推迟。【原文：Indonesia, a major supplier of liquefied natural gas, is asking its overseas buyers to accept delays to some scheduled shipments as domestic energy demand rises.】

item.title: 艾奥云风暴将给英国和爱尔兰带来 "天气炸弹
item.description: 英国气象局预报员说，"艾奥文风暴 "将给爱尔兰和英国带来一颗 "天气炸弹"，引发破坏性的狂风和暴雨。【原文：Storm Éowyn will bring a “weather bomb” to Ireland and the UK, unleashing destructive winds and heavy rain, the Met Office forecaster said.】

item.title: BBVA 将为萨瓦德尔银行交易任命新的内部主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）即将任命新的负责人，该团队正在为西班牙对外银行可能收购规模较小的竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）做准备。【原文：BBVA SA is set to name a new head for the team that’s preparing the Spanish lender for the potential acquisition of smaller rival Banco Sabadell SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易员问 "为什么不？抢购委内瑞拉和黎巴嫩债券
item.description: 新兴市场垃圾债券的大涨激发了投资者对委内瑞拉和黎巴嫩美元债务这两种最牵强交易的兴趣。【原文：A massive rally in emerging-market junk bonds has sparked investor appetite for two of the most far-fetched trades: dollar-denominated debt from Venezuela and Lebanon.】

item.title: 印度保险公司要求监管机构提供更多对冲工具
item.description: 据参与讨论的人士透露，印度保险公司已与监管机构举行会谈，建议引入股票期权作为对冲工具，以加强其风险管理战略。【原文：Indian insurers have held talks with the regulator to propose the introduction of equity options as a hedging tool to boost their risk-management strategies, according to people involved in the discussions.】

item.title: JLR 所有者称利润受中国经济放缓影响
item.description: 捷豹路虎的印度所有者表示，中国市场的需求疲软和消费者对电动汽车的偏好正在损害传统高端汽车的销售，中国的经济挑战正在损害捷豹路虎的盈利能力。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover’s Indian owner said profitability is being hurt by economic challenges in China, a market where weak demand and consumer preference for electric vehicles are hurting sales of traditional top-end cars.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 ESPO 石油运输费用在制裁后上涨五倍
item.description: 据交易商称，俄罗斯ESPO原油运往中国的费用进一步飙升，目前的费率几乎是本月初美国制裁莫斯科石油业之前的五倍。【原文：The fee to ship Russian ESPO crude to China has spiked further, with rates now almost five times higher than what they were prior to US sanctions on Moscow’s oil industry earlier this month, according to traders.】

item.title: 出于安全考虑，日本将加强投资预审
item.description: 日本计划加强对可能与外国情报收集工作合作的海外投资者的预审措施，以解决日益严重的国家安全问题。【原文：Japan plans to strengthen pre-screening measures for overseas investors that could potentially cooperate with foreign intelligence gathering efforts, addressing rising national security concerns.】

item.title: 交易员纷纷押注欧洲央行超大规模降息
item.description: 交易员们正大举押注欧洲央行将在今年年中至少降息半点。【原文：Traders are placing big options bets on the European Central Bank delivering at least one half-point cut to interest rates by the middle of the year.】

item.title: 印度 JSW 钢铁公司寻求高达 9 亿美元的银团贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的钢铁制造商 JSW 钢铁有限公司正在寻求一笔高达 9 亿美元的贷款，为印度借款人的美元债务交易再添一笔。【原文：India’s largest steelmaker JSW Steel Ltd. is seeking a loan of as much as $900 million, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a flurry of dollar debt deals from the nation’s borrowers.】

item.title: 丹尼尔-埃克的 Neko Health 公司融资 2.6 亿美元用于美国扩张
item.description: Neko Health 是 Spotify Technology SA 创始人丹尼尔-埃克（Daniel Ek）创办的一家初创公司，该公司已融资 2.6 亿美元，用于将其人体扫描技术引入美国。【原文：Neko Health, a startup from Spotify Technology SA founder Daniel Ek, has raised $260 million to bring its body-scanning technology to the US.】

item.title: 经济学家警告：英国将面临更频繁的经济衰退
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，在经济增速放缓使英国容易受到增长冲击的影响后，英国很可能面临更频繁的技术性衰退。【原文：Britain is likely to face more frequent technical recessions after a slowdown in the economy’s speed limit made it vulnerable to growth shocks, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 印度股市比以往任何时候都更需要国内投资者
item.description: 由于外国基金抛售有增无减，全球波动加剧，削弱了本地股票的吸引力，印度股票市场对国内投资者的依赖程度空前高涨。【原文：The Indian equity market’s reliance on domestic investors has never been greater as unabated foreign fund selling and rising global volatility dent the appeal of local shares.】

item.title: 苏丹暴力引发骚乱，南苏丹关闭社交媒体
item.description: 南苏丹因其公民在邻国苏丹受到虐待而引发暴力抗议，随后南苏丹指示互联网服务提供商封锁所有社交媒体平台。【原文：South Sudan directed internet service providers to block all social media platforms following violent protests over the mistreatment of its citizens in neighboring Sudan.】

item.title: 富士媒体调查骚扰事件后，J-POP 偶像退出电视工作
item.description: 前男子组合 SMAP 成员中居正广（Masahiro Nakai）被报道骚扰了一名女性，富士电视台的一名员工卷入了这起事件，因此他将退出日本娱乐圈。【原文：Masahiro Nakai, a former member of the boy band SMAP, is retiring from the Japanese entertainment industry following reports that he harassed a woman and that an employee of Fuji TV was involved in the incident.】

item.title: 印度迫使苹果和谷歌向国家支持的应用程序商店开放
item.description: 印度正试图撬开世界上最大的应用程序商店的大门，从而可能与苹果公司和 Alphabet 公司在社会服务、安全标准和该国智能手机的使用权方面发生冲突。【原文：India is trying to pry open the doors of the world’s biggest app stores, setting up a likely clash with Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc. over social services, safety standards and access to the country’s smartphones.】

item.title: 施瓦茨曼、莫伊尼汉和博廷将在达沃斯演讲中提问特朗普
item.description: 周四，达沃斯最令人垂涎的座位将是全体会议，届时美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将向与会者发表远程演讲，演讲内容将通过远程链接传入主会场。【原文：The most coveted seat in Davos on Thursday will be in the plenary when US President Donald Trump delivers a remote address to attendees that will be piped into the main hall via a remote link.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连创新高后有望下滑
莫迪官员称印度将克服特朗普政策的影响
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）与世界最大经济体的关系将帮助印度克服唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的全球贸易变化带来的任何 "负面影响"。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s relationship with the world’s biggest economies will help India overcome any “negative impacts” from shifts in global trade under President Donald Trump, a top official said on Wednesday.】
